Class NetManager

java.lang.Object
NetManager
public class NetManager extends Object
Network Manager class that manages a collection of NetPairs, offering capabilities like adding and removing connections as well as disconnecting or searching for a specific connection

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    NetManager()
    No-args constructor that initializes the list and read/write locks to ensure that the list is not being written to at the wrong times

  • Method Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • NetManager

      public NetManager()
      No-args constructor that initializes the list and read/write locks to ensure that the list is not being written to at the wrong times

  • Method Details

    • addConnection

      public boolean addConnection(NetPair np)
      Adds a connection to the list, but checks if it already exists
      Parameters:
      np - is a NetPair that either is fully initialized or is half initialized with an open listener
      Returns:
      true if the connection was added, false if it was already found

    • removeConnection

      public void removeConnection(NetPair np)
      Removes a connection from the list if it exists
      Parameters:
      np - connection to remove

    • addListener

      public boolean addListener(NetSocket listener, InetAddress addr, int port)
      Adds a listener to an existing NetPair if it exists, or doesn't add if the listener is already present
      Parameters:
      listener - listener to be added
      addr - Address to connect to
      port - Port to connect to
      Returns:
      true if an existing NetPair is found, false if none

    • findConnection

      public NetPair findConnection(InetAddress addr, int port)
      Finds a connection within current connections
      Parameters:
      addr - Address to connect to
      port - Port to connect to
      Returns:
      the found NetPair or null

    • findConnection

      public NetPair findConnection(String addr, int port)
      Finds a connection within current connections
      Parameters:
      addr - Address to connect to
      port - Port to connect to
      Returns:
      the found NetPair or null

    • broadcastAll

      public void broadcastAll(MessageHeader msg)
      Broadcasts a message to all known connections
      Parameters:
      msg - Message to be broadcasted

    • shutdown

      public void shutdown()
      Shuts down all connections

    • printConnections

      public void printConnections()
      Prints out connections and their related information
